scripts.build: ./node_modules/.bin/concurrently "npm run build:server" "npm run build:agent" "npm run build:sitemap" "npm run build:graphql"
scripts.tag: echo "${REGISTRY:?"Must supply registry"}" && ./node_modules/.bin/concurrently "npm run tag:server" "npm run tag:agent" "npm run tag:sitemap" "npm run tag:graphql"
scripts.push: echo "${REGISTRY:?"Must supply REGISTRY"}" && ./node_modules/.bin/concurrently "npm run push:server" "npm run push:agent" "npm run push:sitemap" "npm run push:graphql"
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run tag && npm run auth && npm run push
scripts.conn: ssh -i ${PEM:?"Path to pem required"} ec2-user@${EC2:?"EC2 dns required"}
scripts.deploy: scp -i ${PEM:?"Path to pem required"} -r ${DIST:?"Path to dist required"} ec2-user@${EC2:?"EC2 dns required"}:./data/sellwild
